intro: Delissea deltoidea, commonly known as the delta leaf delissea, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Acanthaceae family and is characterized by its distinctive deltoid-shaped leaves. The plant produces clusters of small, tubular flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. It thrives in well-drained soil and prefers full sun to partial shade. Delissea deltoidea is often cultivated for its ornamental value and ability to attract pollinators.
